General.Name: Borusan Yatirim ve Pazarlama AS
General.Description: Borusan Yatirim ve Pazarlama A.S. invests in companies operating in steel, automotive, logistics, automotive supply, informatics and telecommunications, and e-commerce industries. The company was incorporated in 1977 and is based in Istanbul, Turkey.
General.Address: Parliament-i Mebusan Caddesi No: 37, Istanbul, Turkey
